com.hybris.cis.vindicia.common

Interface VindiciaClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VindiciaClientImpl, VindiciaClientMockImpl, VindiciaClientProxy

    public interface VindiciaClient
    Provides for sending a request to and receiving a response from Vindicia.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String VENDOR_ID
      The vendor id constant for Vindicia.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FetchByMerchantAccountIdResponse runAccountFetch(FetchByMerchantAccountId requestMessage)
      Sends the FetchAccountByMerchantAccountId request to Vindicia and invokes the transactions handler method.
      com.vindicia.soap.v4_2.account.UpdateResponse runAccountUpdate(com.vindicia.soap.v4_2.account.Update requestMessage)
      Sends the AccountUpdate request to Vindicia and invokes the transactions handler method.
      FetchByAccountResponse runAutoBillFetch(FetchByAccount requestMessage)
      Sends the FetchAccountByMerchantAccountId request to Vindicia and invokes the transactions handler method.

      Sends the AutoBillUpdate request to Vindicia and invokes the transactions handler method.
      CancelResponse runCancelSubscription(Cancel requestMessage)
      ends the cancelSubscription request to Vindicia and invokes the transactions handler method.
      com.vindicia.soap.v4_2.paymentmethod.UpdateResponse runPaymentMethodUpdate(com.vindicia.soap.v4_2.paymentmethod.Update requestMessage)
      Sends the PaymentMethodUpdate request to Vindicia and invokes the transactions handler method.
      com.vindicia.soap.v4_2.transaction.AuthCaptureResponse runTransactionAuthCapture(com.vindicia.soap.v4_2.transaction.AuthCapture requestMessage)
      Sends the AuthCapture request to Vindicia and invokes the transactions handler method.
      FinalizeResponse runWebSessionFinalize(Finalize requestMessage)
      Sends the WebSessionFinalize request to Vindicia and invokes the transactions handler method.
      InitializeResponse runWebSessionInitialize(Initialize requestMessage)
      Sends the WebSessionInitialize requestto Vindicia and invokes the handler method.
